name: Erect a Monument
requirement: Spend 8 resources.

name: Sway the Council
requirement: Spend 8 influence.

name: Negotiate Trade Routes
requirement: Spend 5 trade goods.

name: Lead from the Front
requirement: Spend a total of 3 tokens from your tactic and/or strategy pools.

name: Diversify Research
requirement: Own 2 technologies in each of 2 colors.

name: Develop Weaponry
requirement: Own 2 unit upgrade technologies.

name: Found Research Outposts
requirement: Control 3 planets that have technology specialties.

name: Intimidate the Council
requirement: Have 1 or more ships in 2 systems that are adjacent to Mecatol Rex's system.

name: Expand Borders
requirement: Control 6 planets in non-home systems.

name: Corner the Market
requirement: Control 4 planets that each have the same planet trait.

name: Found a Golden Age
requirement: Spend 16 resources.

name: Manipulate Galactic Law
requirement: Spend 16 influence.

name: Centralize Galactic Trade
requirement: Spend 10 trade goods.

name: Galvanize the People
requirement: Spend a total of 6 tokens from your tactic and/or strategy pools.

name: Master of Sciences
requirement: Own 2 technologies in each of 4 colors.

name: Revolutionize Warfare
requirement: Own 3 unit upgrade technologies.

name: Form Galactic Brain Trust
requirement: Control 5 planets that have technology specialties.

name: Conquer the Weak
requirement: Control 1 planet that is in another player's home system.

name: Subdue the Galaxy
requirement: Control 11 planets in non-home systems.

name: Unify the Colonies
requirement: Control 6 planets that each have the same planet trait.

name: Unveil Flagship
requirement: Win a space combat in a system that contains your flagship. You cannot score this if flagship is destroyed.

name: Adapt New Strategies
requirement: Own 2 faction technologies.

metadata.notes: Valefar Assimilator techs do not count.

name: Turn their Fleets to Dust
requirement: Use SPACE CANNON to destroy the last of a player's ships in a system.

name: Master the Laws of Physics
requirement: Own 4 technologies of the same color.

name: Destroy their Greatest Ship
requirement: Destroy another player's war sun or flagship.

name: Form a Spy Network
requirement: Discard 5 action cards.

name: Spark a Rebellion
requirement: Win a combat against a player who has the most victory points.

name: Gather a Mighty Fleet
requirement: Have 5 dreadnoughts on the board.

name: Threaten Enemies
requirement: Have 1 or more ships in a system that is adjacent to another player's home system.

name: Establish a Perimeter
requirement: Have 4 PDS units on the game board.

name: Make an Example of their World
requirement: Use BOMBARDMENT to destroy the last of a player's ground forces on a planet.

name: Fuel the War Machine
requirement: Have 3 space docks on the game board.

name: Cut Supply Lines
requirement: Have 1 or more ships in the same system as another player's space dock.

name: Become the Gatekeeper
requirement: Have 1+ ships in a system with an alpha wormhole AND 1+ ships in a system with a beta wormhole.

name: Monopolize PRODUCTION
requirement: Control 4 industrial planets.

name: Learn the Secrets of the Cosmos
requirement: Have 1 or more ships in 3 systems that are each adjacent to an anomaly.

name: Mine Rare Minerals
requirement: Control 4 hazardous planets.

name: Control the Region
requirement: Have 1 or more ships in 6 systems.

name: Forge an Alliance
requirement: Control 4 cultural planets.

name: Occupy the Seat of the Empire
requirement: Control Mecatol Rex and have 3 or more ships in its system.

name: Amass Wealth
requirement: Spend 3 influence, 3 resources, and 3 trade goods.

name: Build Defenses
requirement: Have 4 or more structures.

name: Discover Lost Outposts
requirement: Control 2 planets that have attachments.

name: Engineer a Marvel
requirement: Have your flagship or a war sun on the board.

name: Explore Deep Space
requirement: Have units in 3 systems that do not contain planets.

name: Improve Infrastructure
requirement: Have structures on 3 planets outside of your home system.

name: Make History
requirement: Have units in 2 systems that contain legendary planets, Mecatol Rex, or anomalies.

name: Populate the Outer Rim
requirement: Have units in 3 systems on the edge of the game board other than your home system.

name: Push Boundaries
requirement: Control more planets than each of your neighbors.

name: Raise a Fleet
requirement: Have 5 or more non-fighter ships in 1 system.

name: Hold Vast Reserves
requirement: Spend 6 influence, 6 resources, and 6 trade goods.

name: Construct Massive Cities
requirement: Have 7 or more structures.

name: Reclaim Ancient Monuments
requirement: Control 3 planets that have attachments.

name: Achieve Supremacy
requirement: Have your flagship or war sun in another player's home system or the Mecatol Rex system.

name: Patrol Vast Territories
requirement: Have units in 5 systems that do not contain planets.

name: Protect The Border
requirement: Have structures on 5 planets outside of your home system.

name: Become a Legend
requirement: Have units in 4 systems that contain legendary planets, Mecatol Rex, or anomalies.

name: Control the Borderlands
requirement: Have units in 5 systems on the edge of the game board other than your home system.

name: Rule Distant Lands
requirement: Control 2 planets that are each in or adjacent to a different, other player's home system.

name: Command an Armada
requirement: Have 8 or more non-fighter ships in 1 system.

name: Become a Martyr
requirement: Lose control of a planet in a home system.

name: Fight With Precision
requirement: Use ANTI-FIGHTER BARRAGE to destroy the last of a player's fighters in a system.

name: Betray a Friend
requirement: Win a combat against a player whose promissory note you had in your play area at the start of your tactical action.

name: Foster Cohesion
requirement: Be neighbors with all other players.

name: Brave the Void
requirement: Win a combat in an anomaly.

name: Hoard Raw Materials
requirement: Control planets that have a combined resource value of at least 12.

name: Darken the Skies
requirement: Win a combat in another player's home system.

name: Mechanize the Military
requirement: Have 1 mech on each of 4 planets.

name: Defy Space and Time
requirement: Have units in the wormhole nexus.

name: Occupy the Fringe
requirement: Have 9 or more ground forces on a planet that does not contain 1 of your space docks.

name: Demonstrate your Power
requirement: Have 3 or more non-fighter ships in the active system at the end of a space combat.

name: Produce en Masse
requirement: Have units with a combined PRODUCTION value of at least 8 in a single system.

name: Destroy Heretical Works
requirement: Purge 2 of your relic fragments of any type.

name: Prove Endurance
requirement: Be the last player to pass during a game round.

name: Dictate Policy
requirement: There are 3 or more laws in play.

name: Seize an Icon
requirement: Control a legendary planet.

name: Drive the Debate
requirement: You or a planet you control are elected by an agenda.

name: Stake Your Claim
requirement: Control a planet in a system that contains a planet controlled by another player.

name: Establish Hegemony
requirement: Control planets that have a combined influence value of at least 12.

name: Strengthen Bonds
requirement: Have another player's promissory note in your play area.
